column4: hi all .. how i can auto-connect on boot to a FTP server with autentication (Ubuntu 10.04)?
you mean, during the boot process, you need to initiate a ftp connection?
or after the boot .. it's the same ..
i need to mount like gvfs can do ..
depending on when you want it to run
ok .. but the question is .. what command i should do?
well, to initiate a ftp connection, use the ftp command
or, if you just want to download a file of a ftp server, you could also use wget
i need to mount the FTP server locally .. like gvfs can do ..
